items.sentence: From what I can tell, Tom isn\'t a bad person.
Pack up the bags. We\'re going back to Boston.
Please don\'t enter the room without knocking.
Tom has been talking on the phone for an hour.
Tom installed a satellite dish on his balcony.
Tom is always forgetting his own phone number.
Would you like to travel to the United States?
You and Tom used to be friends. What happened?
You can be pretty helpful when you want to be.
You can do whatever you want to do, of course.
